name: Inticiti
overview:
We have 10+ years of experience working with a range of Fortune 100 and non-profit clients across financial services, telecommunications, consumer products, the arts, environment, and technology industries.

Further to our experience is five years of international experience, including work in Asia/Pacific and Europe, with a focus on business in China.

A representative sample of clients includes:

  • The largest telecommunications providers in Asia/Pacific, Europe and the US needing to grow their service offerings
  • Large financial services companies, including investment banks, brokerages, audit firms and credit card companies facing performance issues and rising operational costs
  • A large consumer packaged goods company with a troubled product line
  • Large cultural institutions going through organizational and audience changes
  • An environmental land conservation non-profit needing to invest for the next generation of services and contributors
